attributes.additional_details:
The public are fed up, of the corruption, of the lack of change, of the consistent degradation of our infrastructure and of our freedoms.

We call for a country wide vote on a new system of governance, I propose direct democracy, where each registered voter can vote on everything, is given all relevant information and is trusted to want the best for themselves and those around them.

Centralised power has failed, its time for genuine change, not just swapping out puppets.
attributes.background: call a country wide vote for a new system of governance, dissolve perminently parliament, the house of lords and centralised power.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718906
